physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Thickening, yellow discoloration, and subungual hyperkeratosis of all 10 toenails; Scale present on the plantar surface skin and in the web spaces.
Reduction in subungual hyperkeratosis and an increase in clear nail after 6 months of completing therapy.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement in subungual hyperkeratosis and nail clarity.
